notes.text: ok so i used this to get from plat 4 to KoG with only losing 3-4 games in that grind i changed no cards and i dominated 90% of games i legit was not worried any game also never bricked always had princess in hand or 2 amazoness with onslaught and i feel like this is strongest deck right now. spellbooks or masked heroes couldn't touch me and sylvans i either chaliced or econ took to prevent guardioak effect i am very happy cos this is my fastest KoG yet on day 3 also queen is pretty good but i didnt have it if i had it i would play it instead of 1 swordswoman prob. Vision hero witch was pretty good to get rid of wall of d'ed monsters or extra onslaughts and clear backrow also willpower is better than rebirth cos you can search it with princess love you all and i wanna see more amazoness decks hit KoG
